item.description:
How to Win Friends and Influence People

Learn how to connect to people in ways that will win connection and also influence them to your mutual advantages. Learn to give your gifts and receive the gifts of others. Learn also what doesn't work and how to prevent that from happening.

2:00-4:30pm

Traditional cost $40 - Sliding scale to $20

Herb Pearce has been teaching workshops for 30 years, is a therapist for individuals, couples and families and is a relationship and personal life coach.

Call or email anytime with questions. 781 648 3737, herb@herbpearce.com

www.herbpearce.com for more info or to sign up for his email newsletter
item.name: How to Win Friends and Influence People
